rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with direct Vastu alignment for energy flow. Features a foyer that adheres to the principles of balance and symmetry.
An open-plan living area with Brutalist design elements like exposed concrete beams and large windows. Provides optimal natural light in line with Vastu guidelines.
A dining space adjoining the living room. Layout ensures good circulation and connectivity as per local norms.
A master bedroom with privacy and ample light; includes a private balcony facing east to capture morning sunlight for positive energy.
A secondary bedroom with efficient space utilization, designed using Brutalist aesthetic and good ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom ensuring a balanced layout; incorporates sound insulation and proper alignment as per local norms.
Fourth bedroom integrated into the design with efficient space planning, meeting both aesthetic and functional requirements.
Fifth bedroom to maintain symmetry in layout. Designed with Brutalist style and compliance with Vastu principles.
Sixth bedroom ensuring balanced distribution of living spaces; includes provisions for privacy and natural light.
A modern kitchen design featuring an open layout that connects with the dining area. Utilizes local materials in line with building norms.
An outdoor extension offering space for leisure and socializing; designed with direct sightlines to enhance Vastu flow.
A guest bedroom ensuring comfortable accommodation. Design includes integrated closet and proper lighting as per local norms.
Dedicated space for work or study with ample natural light; designed to encourage productivity in a balanced environment.
Service area including storage and facilities. Designed with efficient spatial planning according to building norms.

openings.description: Primary entrance door aligned per Vastu for positive energy entry.
Large window to allow morning sunlight; supports natural ventilation and adheres to local norms.
Provides access to private balcony designed for morning light.
Dedicated opening for pool area ensuring proper ventilation and water drainage in accordance with building norms.

swimming_pool.description: A modern infinity edge pool integrated into the villa design. Positioned to align with Vastu principles, offering both aesthetics and functionality.
